preibisch_imagelib2.transform

Class InverseTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • preibisch_imagelib2.transform.InverseTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvertibleTransform, Transform

    public final class InverseTransform
extends Object
implements InvertibleTransform
    Final implementation of the inverse of an InvertibleTransform that simply replaces apply by applyInverse and conversely. The original InvertibleTransform is returned on inverse().
    Author:
    ImgLib2 developers, Tobias Pietzsch, Stephan Saalfeld
